text: Pride is a Canadian documentary television series, which premiered on OutTV in 2019.Peter Knegt, "Take a trip to Pride celebrations around the world in this wonderful new docu-series". CBC Arts, July 31, 2019. Created by Mark Kenneth Woods and Michael Yerxa, the series features the duo travelling to various LGBT Pride festivals around the world, to explore both the meaning and history of the event."Hampton native shares his Pride in new docuseries". Kings County Record, March 19, 2019. The first season of the series visited Calgary, New York City, Salt Lake City, Palm Springs, Hong Kong and Berlin. At least two more seasons have already been planned. The series received three Leo Award nominations in 2019, for Best Information, Lifestyle or Reality Program or Series, Best Direction in an Information, Lifestyle or Reality Program or Series and Best Host(s) in an Information, Lifestyle or Reality Program or Series. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2010s Canadian documentary television series Category:OutTV (Canadian TV channel) original programming Category:2019 Canadian television series debuts Category:2010s Canadian LGBT-related television series Category:2020s Canadian LGBT-related television series
title: Pride (Canadian TV series)
